languages.text:
The Operative removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} from the target, decreasing the target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −<u>(15 + exploits removed × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u>% until the start of the Operative's next turn.
If this ability reduces the target's armour to 0, the Operative removes only half of the exploits from the target.
languages.original_text:
Оперативник снимает с цели все {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимости{/g}, снижая ее {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} на −<u>(15 + число снятых уровней эффекта "уязвимость" × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u>% до начала следующего хода оперативника.
Если способность уменьшает броню цели до 0, оперативник снимает с цели только половину уязвимостей.

traits.locale_text: The Adept removes 1 exploit from the target to decrease its dodge, parry, and armour by −<u>(10 + 2 × Adept's PER bonus)</u>% until the start of Adept's next turn.

The Operative removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} from the target, decreasing the target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −<u>(15 + exploits removed × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u>% until the start of the Operative's next turn.
If this ability reduces the target's armour to 0, the Operative removes only half of the exploits from the target.

If this ability reduces the target's armour to 0, the Operative removes only half of the exploits from the target.

If this ability reduces the target's armour to 0, the Operative removes only half of the exploits from the target.

The Operative removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} from the target, decreasing the target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −<u>(10 + exploits removed × {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus})</u>% until the start of the Operative's next turn.
If this ability reduces the target's armour to 0, the Operative removes only half of the exploits from the target.

The Operative removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} from the target, decreasing the target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −<u>(15 + exploits removed × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u>% until the start of the Operative's next turn.
If this ability reduces the target's armour to 0, the Operative removes only half of the exploits from the target.

languages.text:
特工移除目标身上所有的{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}层数，使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低<u>（15+移除的“研究”层数×{uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}）</u>%，效果持续至特工的下个回合开始。
如果此能力将目标的护甲降低至0，则目标只会损失一半的“研究”层数。
languages.original_text:
The Operative removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} from the target, decreasing the target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −<u>(15 + exploits removed × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u>% until the start of the Operative's next turn.
If this ability reduces the target's armour to 0, the Operative removes only half of the exploits from the target.

traits.locale_text: 技师移除目标身上所有的“研究”层数，使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低<u>（10+研究效果层数×技师的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%，效果持续至技师的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}移除目标身上所有的{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}层数，使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低<u>（15+移除的“研究”层数×{uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}）</u>%，效果持续至特工的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。
如果此能力将目标的护甲降低至0，则目标只会损失一半的“研究”层数。

languages.text:
El agente elimina las {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidades{/g} del objetivo para reducir la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} en un −<u>(15 + vulnerabilidades eliminadas × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u> % hasta el principio del siguiente turno del agente.
Si la capacidad reduce la armadura del objetivo a 0, el agente solo elimina la mitad de las vulnerabilidades del objetivo.
languages.original_text:
The Operative removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} from the target, decreasing the target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −<u>(15 + exploits removed × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u>% until the start of the Operative's next turn.
If this ability reduces the target's armour to 0, the Operative removes only half of the exploits from the target.

traits.locale_text: El agente elimina las {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidades{/g} del objetivo para reducir la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} en un −<u>(10 + acumulación de vulnerabilidades × {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus})</u> % hasta el principio del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del agente.

El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agente{/g} elimina las {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidades{/g} del objetivo para reducir la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} en un −<u>(15 + vulnerabilidades eliminadas × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u> % hasta el principio del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del agente.
Si la capacidad reduce la armadura del objetivo a 0, el agente solo elimina la mitad de las vulnerabilidades del objetivo.

languages.text:
オペレーターがターゲットからすべての{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}を無効にし、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}、および{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を−<u>(15 + 取り除いたエクスプロイト数 × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u>%を、次のターン開始時まで減少させる。
このアビリティでターゲットのアーマーが0になった場合、オペレーターはターゲットから半分のエクスプロイトのみ取り除ける。
languages.original_text:
The Operative removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} from the target, decreasing the target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −<u>(15 + exploits removed × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u>% until the start of the Operative's next turn.
If this ability reduces the target's armour to 0, the Operative removes only half of the exploits from the target.

オペレーターがターゲットからすべての{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}を無効にし、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}、および{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を−<u>(15 + 取り除いたエクスプロイト数 × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u>%を、次のターン開始時まで減少させる。
このアビリティでターゲットのアーマーが0になった場合、オペレーターはターゲットから半分のエクスプロイトのみ取り除ける。

オペレーターがターゲットからすべての{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}を取り除き、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}、および{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を−<u>(15 + 取り除いたエクスプロイト数 × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u>%を、次のターン開始時まで減少させる。
このアビリティでターゲットのアーマーが0になった場合、オペレーターはターゲットから半分のエクスプロイトのみ取り除ける。

languages.text:
Оперативник снимает с цели все {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимости{/g}, снижая ее {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} на −<u>(15 + число снятых уровней эффекта "уязвимость" × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u>% до начала следующего хода оперативника.
Если способность уменьшает броню цели до 0, оперативник снимает с цели только половину уязвимостей.
languages.original_text:
The Operative removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} from the target, decreasing the target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −<u>(15 + exploits removed × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u>% until the start of the Operative's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Адепт снимает с цели все уязвимости, снижая ее {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} на −<u>(10 + число уровней эффекта "уязвимость" × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} адепта)</u>% до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} адепта.

Адепт снимает с цели все уязвимости, снижая ее {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} на −<u>(10 + число уровней эффекта "уязвимость" × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} адепта)</u>% до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} адепта.

Оперативник снимает с цели все {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимости{/g}, снижая ее {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} на −<u>(15 + число снятых уровней эффекта "уязвимость" × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u>% до начала следующего хода оперативника.
Если способность уменьшает броню цели до 0, оперативник снимает с цели только половину уязвимостей.

Оперативник снимает с цели все {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимости{/g}, снижая ее {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} на −<u>(10 + число снятых уровней эффекта "уязвимость" × {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus})</u>% до начала следующего хода оперативника.
Если способность должна снизить броню цели до 0, оперативник снимает только половину уязвимостей с цели.

languages.text:
Der Agent entfernt alle {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzungen{/g} des Ziels und verringert {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} des Ziels bis zum Beginn des nächsten Zuges des Agenten um −<u>(15 + entfernte Ausnutzungen × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u> %.
Wenn diese Fähigkeit die Rüstung des Ziels auf 0 reduziert, entfernt der Agent nur die Hälfte der Ausnutzungen des Ziels.
languages.original_text:
The Operative removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} from the target, decreasing the target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −<u>(15 + exploits removed × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u>% until the start of the Operative's next turn.
If this ability reduces the target's armour to 0, the Operative removes only half of the exploits from the target.

traits.locale_text: Der Agent entfernt sämtliche Instanzen von {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzen{/g} vom Ziel, um dessen {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} bis zum Start des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Agenten um −<u>(10 + Ausnutzungsstapel × {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus})</u> % zu reduzieren.

Der Agent entfernt alle {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzungen{/g} vom Ziel und verringert {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} des Ziels bis zu Beginn des nächsten Zugs des Agenten um −<u>(15 + entfernte Ausnutzungen × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u> %.
Wenn diese Fähigkeit die Rüstung des Ziels auf 0 reduziert, entfernt der Agent nur die Hälfte der Ausnutzungen vom Ziel.

languages.text:
L'agent supprime toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilités{/g} de la cible et réduit son {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}, sa {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} et son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de <u>(15 + vulnérabilités supprimées × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u> % jusqu'au début du prochain tour de l'agent.
Si cette capacité réduit l'armure de la cible à 0, l'agent ne supprime que la moitié des vulnérabilités de la cible.
languages.original_text:
The Operative removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} from the target, decreasing the target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −<u>(15 + exploits removed × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u>% until the start of the Operative's next turn.
If this ability reduces the target's armour to 0, the Operative removes only half of the exploits from the target.

traits.locale_text:
L'agent supprime toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilités{/g} de la cible et réduit son {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}, sa {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} et son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de <u>(15 + vulnérabilités supprimées × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u> % jusqu'au début du prochain tour de l'agent.
Si cette capacité réduit l'armure de la cible à 0, l'agent ne supprime que la moitié des vulnérabilités de la cible.

L’{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Opérateur{/g} supprime tous les {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} de la cible et réduit son {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}, sa {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} et son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de <u>(15 + exploits supprimés × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u> % jusqu’au début du prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l’Opérateur.
Si cette capacité réduit l’armure de la cible à 0, l’Opérateur ne supprime que la moitié des exploits de la cible.

languages.text:
Ajan, hedefteki tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}sömürüleri{/g} kaldırarak hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değerlerini %<u>(15 + kaldırılan sömürü × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u> kadar azaltır. Bu etki, Ajan'ın bir sonraki turunun başlangıcına dek devam eder.
Kabiliyet, hedefin zırh değerini 0'a düşürürse Ajan, hedefteki sömürülerin yalnızca yarısını kaldırır.

If this ability reduces the target's armour to 0, the Operative removes only half of the exploits from the target.
